node.display_long_description:
From the creators of ‚ÄúVirtual Virtual Reality‚Äù - Welcome to the Under! A time and mind bending adventure.

**Now with FREE DEMO: over 30 minutes of single player mysteries to discover**

Enter THE UNDER, our otherworldly multiplayer hub, and discover a vast mystical desert with other players. Explore and engage with your fellow Time Sprites to unlock and discover the secrets buried beneath the sands. Learn and perform magic in collective rituals to alter the world around you. You never know who you might cross paths with while catching a show on the Under stage, investigating the Observatory, or tending the MC‚Äôs garden‚Ä¶  Available as in-app purchase ($11.99 USD). 

Then, take a journey on TIMEBOAT! Board a research vessel lost in the Arctic ice, doomed to shipwreck. Follow the crew and an unusual dolphin, unlock hidden mysteries, and manipulate time to alter their fates! 

*For everyone‚Äôs safety, the staff would like to discourage guests from using ritual magic to enlarge the crobs.*

nodes.title: Tempest: Final Weeks
nodes.body_text: Thank you for all of the support you've shown Tempest these past months! In celebration of the conclusion of our main run, we are dropping the price to $8.99 per ticket from September 18-30!! Let‚Äôs celebrate together before we disembark into thin air‚Ä¶

nodes.title: Tempest: Shows Added Through August
nodes.body_text: A thundering thank you to all of you who have explored our brave new world and seen one of our daily live performances of Tempest! We have been thrilled with the overwhelming excitement of our esteemed audience members and cannot wait to see what the next series of shows hold. Showtimes have now been added for August, visit our in-game box office to catch a show! We will see you in the storm...

node.reviewDescription:
I've recently got this game, because it's made by the creators of virtual virtual reality, so what could be bad about it? The answer...

Nothing(was that a good build up?ü§´)

But I am yet to buy the full game, so I've only seen the demo. And what a demo it was. It's not gotten boring once, and I've replayed it 12 times! So no recommendations here, just telling you and others about my expirience so far. But I'm definitely getting the timeboat and multiplayer. That's also why I got the game. I'm less of a chatty person, and prefer things like beat saber multiplayer, or a rec room junior account(even though rec room doesent work). I dont like using voice chat. But this game hooked me. No voice chat, real actors, magic mask...  it was the perfect game for me. So I'm gonna edit this review when I buy the multiplayer and timeboat, but thank you for reading it anyway üòÅ



Edit:
I'm so happy I got this add on. As soon as I joined I was greeted to someone watching a show, and he was really kind. Also, this one guy was teaching me how to change my hat. Then someone made a finger that I then ate. Overall best community ever, not boring at all and great map. It's a must play/must buy. And the spells are so cool. I liked figuring them out as I played. And the people in the jars in the demo show up in the theatre. Plus how do you change the symbols on your mask? So overall get the add on, it's worth it, and it will change the demo at some point.












BYE THIS GAME NOW












BYE






















BYE
node.reviewTitle: Great experience so far...+ I got it
